#.2 test
```{r}
r22<-read.csv(paste(find.package("stratools"),"/data/reis_22.csv",sep="")) 

library(mapview)
library(sf)

r22 %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords=c("X","Y"),crs=4326)%>%
  mapview()


BD<-r22 %>% dplyr::select(sample,phi,bed,thick=THICKNESS..m.,facies,sub="sub.facies.association") 

logploter(BD,well="PR004")

```
